__TOC__


* <nowiki>[[ZATeam|Ubuntu-ZA Loco Team]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[ZATeam-TeamReports|Team Reports]]</nowiki>

Meetings are held every 4th Tuesday of each month at 20:30 SAST (UTC+2) in #ubuntu-za on irc.freenode.net and are pretty informal. Anyone is free to join in and give comments and suggestions, its even encouraged.
